name: MSC Industrial Direct Co., Inc.
description: MSC Industrial Direct Co., Inc. is a leading distributor of metalworking and maintenance, repair, and operations (MRO) products in the United States. Established in 1941, MSC has built a reputation for delivering high-quality products and exceptional customer service to a diverse range of industries, including manufacturing, aerospace, automotive, and energy. The company's extensive product portfolio includes cutting tools, abrasives, fasteners, and safety equipment, as well as innovative supply chain solutions that help customers optimize their operations. MSC is dedicated to providing its customers with the tools and resources needed to enhance productivity and efficiency in their manufacturing processes. The company leverages advanced technology and a robust e-commerce platform to ensure a seamless shopping experience, offering next-day delivery on a wide selection of products. With a commitment to sustainability, MSC also focuses on eco-friendly products and practices, contributing to a more sustainable future for the industries it serves. Through its dedicated team of professionals and a customer-centric approach, MSC Industrial Direct continues to be a trusted partner for businesses across America.

key_executives.name: David A. M. C. M. G. S. L. S. A. C. C. C. S. S. P.

faq.answer: MSC Industrial Direct specializes in the distribution of metalworking and MRO products.

faq.question: Where is MSC Industrial Direct headquartered?
faq.answer: MSC Industrial Direct is headquartered in Melville, New York, USA.

faq.question: What are the main product categories offered by MSC?
faq.answer: MSC offers cutting tools, MRO supplies, safety equipment, and more.

faq.question: When was MSC Industrial Direct founded?
faq.answer: MSC Industrial Direct was founded in 1941.
